summary: Fades the entity to a new opacity level.

parameters.name: opacity
parameters.description: The new opacity to apply to the entity.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: ***Optional:*** the time in milliseconds that it should take for the entity to reach its new opacity level; or ```0``` / ```undefined``` to change it immediately.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: **Optional:** the function to be called when the entity has finished changing opacity.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
